forest_path.description: You are on a forest path. There is a cave entrance to the north and a ruined hut to the east.

forest_path_key_taken.description: You are on a forest path. There is a cave entrance to the north and a ruined hut to the east.

ruined_hut.description: Inside the hut you find rubble and a rusty iron key on the floor.

ruined_hut_key_taken.description: You are in the ruined hut. You've taken the iron key.

cave_entrance.description: You are at the entrance of a dark cave. There's a path leading inside to the north and a cliff trail to the west.

cliff_trail.description: You walk along a narrow cliff. The trail ends abruptly. One wrong step could be fatal.

game_over_fall.description: You slip on the cliff edge and fall. Game over.

dark_tunnel.description: You are in a pitch-black tunnel. There's a light ahead to the east and a side chamber to the north.

side_chamber.description: The chamber contains strange symbols. There's a hidden passage west.

trap_room.description: The floor gives way beneath you â€” it's a trap!

stone_door.description: You find a large stone door with a keyhole. The passage continues east beyond it.

treasure_room_locked.description: You unlock the stone door. Inside is the treasure chamber, glittering with gold.
